main event: A group of unidentified lights were sighted by airline pilots near Portland, Oregon, on 30 July 1949.
interesting points: The object displayed two red lights and one white light.,It hovered in the vicinity for approximately 30 minutes before disappearing to the southeast.,One pilot attempted an intercept but the object easily pulled away.,The object was comparable to a helicopter in terms of maneuverability.,Weather conditions were clear at the time of the sighting with unlimited visibility.
sighted object: one unidentified flying object with two red lights and one white light
